::WindRider::
WindRider walked in. "Uh, I hope that I'm not
bothering you," he said, "but there's some things I
want to ask you."
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> ::Battera:;
> 
> She heard a knock at her door. Called out,"Come on
> in, it's open."
> She wasn't sure she wanted to even see anyone, but
> she hoped it was 
> someone to tell her that the leader was ready to see
> her.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > ::WindRider::
> > WindRider walked down the corridor until he came
> to
> > Battera's quarters. He turned toward the door and
> > knocked.
> 
> 
>
